'''''Vinyar Tengwar 42''''' is the forty-second issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|41|43}}

==Content==
* Letters to ''VT''

* "''[[The Rivers and Beacon-hills of Gondor]]''"✫ — J.R.R. Tolkien, ed. Carl F. Hostetter
* "[[Negation in Quenya]]"✫ — Bill Welden
* "Transitions in Translations: ''Upphaflega íslensk heiti''" (column) — Arden R. Smith

<small>✫ contains formerly unpublished material</small>
